name: AWG - Agent weapon generator
description:
Agent Technicians wanted: Help Anti-war group agency (AWG) to prevent another World War!

Create weapons based on agent requests and meet their requirements for success. It is not as easy as it might look. Try putting one or more objects on the crafting table to assembly a brand new mighty weapon.

Good luck to all new technicians.

Best regards,

Peter Phillips

Head of AWG agency

GMTK Game Jam 2021 submission (Theme: Joined together)
